Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with dark-brown resinous deposit, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of four lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394764) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394764)
